name: Data East
info:
• 别名: データイースト
  • 别名: データイースト株式会社
  • 别名: Data East Corporation
  • 别名: DECO
  • 别名: デコ
  • 生日: 1976年4月20日
  • 停业日: 2003年6月25日
detail: Data East Corporation (株式会社データイースト), also abbreviated as DECO, was a Japanese video game and electronic engineering company. The company was in operation from 1976 to 2003, and released 150 video game titles. Its main headquarters were located in Suginami, Tokyo. The American subsidiary, Data East USA, was headquartered in San Jose, California.

works.name: 探偵 神宮寺三郎 夢の終わり
